title: Overfast Brought a Wild New Aero Crankset and a Sub 1000 Gram Road Wheelset: Taipei Cycle Show 2025
content:
Overfast is going after marginally marginal gains with a slew of aero and weight-weenie-worthy gear at Taipei Cycle Show 2025.

Read the full article at Overfast Brought a Wild New Aero Crankset and a Sub 1000 Gram Road Wheelset: Taipei Cycle Show 2025 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
